detail:
- UI Changes in upload/download
- Service/Service level logging

- Reset url on clear configuration
- JSON schema UI enhancement
- Option for Textarea UI for String 
- Action remove popup menu once menu item has been selected
- Add ability to collapse schema text component.
UI changes
Fixes for MQTT simulation and File default directory
Added zipped configuration upload/download

- Added YamlEditor to Service Operation page
- Added iteration/filter action 
- Added services/aws/operation action
- Added search bar and pagination on service operation
- Added error handling to data/json actions
- Added data/binary/byte-size action
- Added UI enhancement for data reference selection to be more intuitive
- Added ability to paste action in add action chooser
- Added more configuration guidance
- Added file/list options
- Added support for MQTT client
- Added additional logging for HTTP 
- Added syslog udp action
- Added Basic file management support
- Changed default file directory for file actions

- Added UI banner support
- Added UI required schema value information
- Added media type select
- Enhanced api/operation
- Added array intersection, not-in and union actions

- Added ability to edit simulation data
- Fixed version removal issue during configuration import
- Client TLS enhancements
- Added deepObject query style support
- UI enhancements
- Added JSON formatted log message support
- Enhanced YAML editor support for Schema definitions
- Enhanced UUID action
- Added reduced data type chooser options based on schema
- Added database select, insert, delete, update actions

- Added DB error message improvements
- Added Simulation improvements
- Added cors support
Improved database error handling and status messages

- Add Base DN to LDAP Client configuration
- ldap/bind action

- UI changes
- Improved data/binary actions
- Ability to return error for database/query action instead of raising exception
UI updates
Version numbering fix
Fix SOLO installation bootup issue
Future enhancements
Miscellaneous bug fixes
Minor bug fixes and internal test updates

Splitting of Process Table into Server and Client Tables
License updates
New UI for API AutoFlow Pro
API Interactor new release beta-1

Following changes are included
- UI improvements
- Login redirect fix
- Web socket server support

Following changes are included
- Fixed Dark mode invisible text issue
- Added binary schema hex value type
- Added URL variables for HTTP actions

Following changes are included
- New UI and infrastructure
- Handle Content-Type header for HTTP response decode
- Add URL variable parameter to HTTP actions
